<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_publications.PublicationAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>PublicationAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var PublicationAjax = Class.create(); PublicationAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, { getNotificationId: function(){ var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_publications_publication'); if(gr.canRead() && gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_pub_id'))){ return gr.getValue('notification'); } },
type: 'PublicationAjax' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-01-17 00:09:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0b628eb4c30112004bd67bfaa2d3aeef</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>PublicationAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Targeted Communications" source="sn_publications">0fdd6483d72302004f1e82285e61033a</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Targeted Communications">0fdd6483d72302004f1e82285e61033a</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0b628eb4c30112004bd67bfaa2d3aeef</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-25 00:35:34</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
